titleStmt.title: Some prison meditations of an humble heart given forth from a child in Israel, whose soul very dearly loveth his Heavenly Fathers children : much desiring, (and travelling in spirit for) their prosperity in the truth, even as for his own soul ... / by a sufferer for the truth in the common goal of Edmondsbury, whose earthen vessel bears the name of William Bennit.
titleStmt.author: Bennit, William, d. 1684.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
